body.p: If this is the first time you are installing FM2DITA you will need to enter an authorization code before it can be used. You can request a 30-day trial code by choosing the Pubs-Tools FM2DITATry Now command. Enter your trial or full authorization code by choosing the Pubs-ToolsFM2DITA Enter Authorization Code command
